Perl 6:Procedural sub factorial ( int $n ){ my $result = 1; loop ( ; $n 0; $n-- ){ $result *= $n; } return $result; }
C++ factorial(int n) { for(int i=1, f = 1; i =n; i++) f *= i; return f; }
Java: functional int factorial(int x) { return x == 0 ? 1 : x * factorial(x-1); }

?php $a = array('a' = '1', 'b' = array('t' = '4', 'g' = array('e' = '8'))); $b = array('c' = '3', 'b' = array('0' = '4', 'g' = array('h' = '5', 'v' = '9'))); $c = array_merge_recursive($a, $b); print_r($c); ? outputs: Array ( [a] = 1 [b] = Array ( [t] = 4 [g] = Array ( [e] = 8 [h] = 5 [v] = 9 ) [0] = 4 ) [c] = 3 )
